titles.title: Recognizing and honoring Sacramento, California, Mayor Joe Serna, Jr., and expressing the condolences of the House of Representatives to his family and the people of Sacramento on his death.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Mr. Ose moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Res. 363.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 11/8/1999--Introduced. Recognizes and honors Sacramento Mayor Joe Serna, Jr., and extends condolences to his family and the citizens of Sacramento, California, on his death.
